description_zh: 让平台行为识别此对象为实体，也允许从上下两端穿透而过。
description_en: A solid the Platform behavior can also jump on to from underneath.

conditions.description_zh: 测试该行为在当前是否启用
conditions.description_en: Test whether the behavior is currently enabled.

actions.description_zh: 该对象是否被视为平台。
actions.description_en: Set whether the object counts as a platform or not.

properties.description_zh: 游戏初始化时，是否默认启用该行为。
properties.description_en: Whether the behavior is initially enabled or disabled.
